item.title: About
item.description: About Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I’m Ioannis (Yannis) Vasilopoulos. I currently live in Prague and work as a Machine Learning Engineer at Siemens. In my last role, Î™ primarily focus on software development and machine learning engineering, adheering to MLOps principles. Contact You can reach me by email at iovannis@outlook.com and also connect with me on LinkedIn.

item.title: whoami: Ioannis, Giannis, or Yannis? ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡· issues.
item.description: If you are reading this, chances are you’re one of my colleagues. Hello there ðŸ¤— Perhaps you’ve might have noticed me sending private messages as Giannis, or Yannis. However, in official documents and professional settings, my name is listed as “Ioannis” ðŸ¤” Unfortunately, I don’t possess multiple identities ðŸ˜„ My name is officially Î™Ï‰Î¬Î½Î½Î·Ï‚, which directly translates to English as Ioannis. However, this sounds too formal in common Greek, and thus its diminutive form, Î“Î¹Î¬Î½Î½Î·Ï‚, is preferred.
